title: UBS Hires Secondary Deal Maker Abhijit Mitra From Lazard
sub_head: The Swiss investment bank is building up its secondaries and fund financing business in New York
body:
The private-funds group of investment bank UBS Group AG is adding secondary-deal specialist Abhijit Mitra from Lazard Ltd. to lead its secondary advisory business focused on sponsor-led transactions, according to people familiar with the matter.
Mr. Mitra, known as “Abhi,” is joining the bank in the fall from New York-based Lazard, where he has worked for the past 11 years in its private-capital advisory group, most recently as a managing director. He brings expertise in structuring general-partner-led secondary deals and continuation funds and will join as head of GP Capital Advisory, Americas, reporting to Kevin Kuryla, global head of the bank’s private funds group.
